sections.headline: Everything you need to optimize profitably.
sections.subtitle: AdPulse combines optimization recommendations with impact measurement—so you can make changes with confidence and know what actually worked.

props.title: Stop the Bleeding
props.description: AdPulse finds search terms burning money (2-3x your break-even with zero sales) and shows you exactly what to block.

props.title: Capture Hidden Winners
props.description: Automatically identifies high-performers buried in Auto/Broad campaigns. Promotes them to exact match for maximum efficiency.

props.title: Know What Actually Worked (With Proof)
props.description: Every decision gets tracked. Two weeks later, you see exactly how much revenue it drove—or didn't.

props.title: Stop Repeating Mistakes
props.description: Without feedback, you make the same non-working changes over and over. AdPulse shows you what didn't work so you stop wasting time on bad patterns.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Most PPC tools show you before/after metrics. But they can't tell you if your decisions caused the change, or if it was just market luck.

bad_example.label: ❌ Black Box Reporting
bad_example.text: "Your ROAS went from 2.5 to 3.0 after our optimizations!"
bad_example.footnote: (But the whole account went up 18%. Market trend? Seasonality? You'll never know.)

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: AdPulse uses counterfactual analysis to calculate what would have happened without your changes—then measures the difference.

good_example.label: ✓ White Box Reporting
good_example.footnote: This is the incremental revenue your decision added, adjusted for market baseline.

steps.title: Track Every Decision
steps.description: When you change a bid, add a negative, or harvest a keyword—we log it with timestamp and details.

steps.title: Measure at 14/30/60 Days
steps.description: Amazon attribution is slow. We wait for real results, not 7-day noise.

steps.title: Calculate Expected Outcome
steps.description: Based on account-wide trends and 30-day rolling baselines, we model what would have happened without your change.

steps.title: Show the Difference
steps.description: Actual outcome - Expected outcome = Verified Decision Impact. No trust-me-bro claims.
